code: import React from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import Select from'react-select';import{Formik,Form,Field}from'formik';import*as Yup from'yup';import{showNotification}from'utils/notifications';import GradientButton from'components/Common/gradient-button';import vehicles from'data/vehicles.json';import Checkbox from'../partials/checkbox';import Players from'../partials/players';export default function AdminVehicleCreator(){async function createVehicle(data){await rpc.callServer('Admin-CreateVehicle',data);showNotification('success','ТС успiшно створено');}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Formik,{initialValues:{model:'',player:'',temporary:false},validationSchema:Yup.object({model:Yup.string().required().min(1).max(1000)}),onSubmit:values=>createVehicle(Object.values(values))},formik=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Form,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Field,{className:"admin_field",type:"text",name:"model",placeholder:"\u041C\u043E\u0434\u0435\u043B\u044C"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Select,{className:"admin_select",classNamePrefix:"admin_select",placeholder:"\u0422\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0441\u043F\u043E\u0440\u0442\u043D\u0438\u0439 \u0437\u0430\u0441i\u0431",options:Object.entries(vehicles).map(_ref=>{let[value,label]=_ref;return{value,label};}),noOptionsMessage:()=>'Не знайдено',onChange:option=>formik.setFieldValue('model',option===null||option===void 0?void 0:option.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Players,{onChange:data=>formik.setFieldValue('player',data.dbId)}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Checkbox,{name:"temporary",label:"\u0422\u0438\u043C\u0447\u0430\u0441\u043E\u0432\u0435"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(GradientButton,{type:"submit"},"\u0421\u0442\u0432\u043E\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0438")));}
